lines:
Tri-State College

Arcredited

PRESIDENT'S OFFICE

L. M. SNIFF, A. M., PRESIDENT

ANGOLA, INDIANA,

Plilibet icadecey

ANGOLA, INDIANA, July 22, 1912 
To so Regisla

Adeves has 
Dear Rezin Eilored fire a blauk Cedh sheh 
in which file the credits Sms, Shine e Luk, 
a Chinese, who attended geser lestitabia two 
i en years ago An early reply is der 
dired. Thanking for

orailey

Secretary
raw: Tri-State College Arcredited PRESIDENT'S OFFICE L. M. SNIFF, A. M., PRESIDENT ANGOLA, INDIANA, Plilibet icadecey ANGOLA, INDIANA, July 22, 1912 To so Regisla Adeves has Dear Rezin Eilored fire a blauk Cedh sheh in which file the credits Sms, Shine e Luk, a Chinese, who attended geser lestitabia two i en years ago An early reply is der dired. Thanking for orailey Secretary

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter enclosing a blank credit sheet in which to fill in the credits of Shin C. Luk.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
